titleStmt.title: A chorologicall discourse of the vvell ordering, disposing, and gouerning of an honorable estate or reuennue Briefely describing the duties of diuers officers therein to be imployed: for the better preseruing, improuing and augmenting of the same. Together with certaine briefe and necessary tables for the valuation of leases, annuities, and purchases, either in present or in reuersion. Written by T. C. Gent.
Chorologicall discourse of the well ordering, disposing, and gouerning of an honourable estate or reuennue
titleStmt.author: Clay, Thomas.

titleStmt.title: A chorologicall discourse of the vvell ordering, disposing, and gouerning of an honorable estate or reuennue Briefely describing the duties of diuers officers therein to be imployed: for the better preseruing, improuing and augmenting of the same. Together with certaine briefe and necessary tables for the valuation of leases, annuities, and purchases, either in present or in reuersion. Written by T. C. Gent.
Chorologicall discourse of the well ordering, disposing, and gouerning of an honourable estate or reuennue
titleStmt.author: Clay, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Eld dwlling [sic] in Little-Britaine,

notesStmt.note: Another issue of STC 5371.5 with a cancel title page. The subsidiary title page for the tables on E1r in this and STC 5371.7 retains its date of 1618--STC.
Reproduction of original in the St. John's College Library, Cambridge University, Cambridge, England.
